name: Half One
description:
Half One takes place during the inquisition. You must find a shelter early. They are coming for you.


                                               Keyboard Controls:

                       Movement:                                   Actions:                          Menu:
             |    W     |          |       ↑      |                           J  & Z                             ENTER
             | A S D |          |  ←↓→ |                                                                           ↵
                     

                                       Review our prototype here!

Did you found a bug?  
Help us kill that little bastard by completing this little survey!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1qezcF9tMQRyb4J_t4r_E98FgG2DtTyXCRlMoIXbbYNE/vie...

                                                   Added Features:

- Added the "Save & Load" features.

- Pressing the "Continue" button without a saved game now creates a fresh new save file.

                                                        Patch Notes:

                                           Bugfixes because we all love bugs!

- Fixed some "Game Breaking" bugs.

- Bugfixes that couldnt let the player buy one of the items.

- Fixed a bug where you could get the same item twice in a row.

- Fixed a bug where the scenes and the NPC's would reset after leaving the scene.

- Fixed a bug where some NPC's would loop their dialogs.



                                   Half One by team BlurredStudio™

                                                           Current version: 1.16.2.

                                                             Artist - Daniel Marques
